00221   public function pushScriptFile( $path, $position = CClientScript::POS_HEAD )
00222   {

00230     $this->_scriptQueue[] = array( $path, $position );

00265   protected function _renderContainer( $endTag = null )
00266   {
00267     if ( null === $endTag )
00268     {
00269       echo YiiXL::closeTag( $endTag );
00270       return false;
00271     }
00272 
00273     //  Get our tag name and make it so...
00274     echo YiiXL::tag(
00275       $_tag = $this->getOption( 'tagName', 'div' ),
00276       $this->getOption( 'containerOptions', array() ),
00277       null,
00278       false
00279     );
00280 
00281     //  Return tag so we can close it...
00282     return $_tag;
00283   }
00284 
00290   protected function _renderCss()
00291   {
00292     $_baseUrl = YiiXL::_gbu();
00293 
00294     //  Load css files and unset from array...
00295     while ( null !== ( $_file = array_shift( $this->_scriptQueue ) ) )
00296       YiiXL::_rcf( $_baseUrl . $_file['path'] , $_file['media'] );
00297 
00298     return true;
00299   }

00316   protected function _renderScripts()
00317   {
00318     $_baseUrl = YiiXL::_gbu();
00319 
00320     //  Load css files and unset from array...
00321     while ( null !== ( $_file = array_shift( $this->_scriptQueue ) ) )
00322       YiiXL::_rsf( $_baseUrl . $_file['path'] , $_file['position'] );
00323 
00324     return true;
00325   }

00331   protected function _loadConfiguration( $options = array( ), $overwriteExisting = true )
00332   {
00333     //  Make a copy for posterity
00334     if ( $overwriteExisting || empty( $this->_options ) ) $this->_options = $options;
00335     else $this->_options = array_merge( $this->_options, $options );
00336 
00337     //  Try to set each one
00338     try
00339     {
00340       foreach ( $options as $_key => $_value )
00341       {
00342         try
00343         {
00344           //  See if __set has a better time with this...
00345           if ( method_exists( $this, 'set' . $_key ) ) $this->{'set' . $_key}( $_value );
00346           else if ( property_exists( $this, $_key ) ) $this->{$_key} = $_key;
00347         }
00348         catch ( Exception $_ex )
00349         {
00350           //  Completely ignore errors...
00351         }
00352       }
00353     }
00354     catch ( Exception $_ex )
00355     {
00356       Yii::log( 'Error while loading configuration options: ' . $_ex->getMessage(), 'error', 'yiixl.base' );
00357     }
00358   }
